languages.text: Варп-прорыв закончился неописуемыми потерями. Тысячи пустотников мертвы, а системам корабля нанесен ужасный урон. Но хуже всего — скверна, что, распространившись среди команды, в будущем станет причиной еще многих и многих бед...

The warp breach has ended in untold losses. Thousands of voidsmen are dead, and the ship's systems have sustained terrible damage. Worst of all, however, is that the taint that has spread among the crew is bound to cause many more misfortunes in the days to come.
languages.original_text: Варп-прорыв закончился неописуемыми потерями. Тысячи пустотников мертвы, а системам корабля нанесен ужасный урон. Но хуже всего — скверна, что, распространившись среди команды, в будущем станет причиной еще многих и многих бед...

traits.locale_text: The warp breach has ended in untold losses. Thousands of voidborn are dead, and the ship's systems have sustained terrible damage. The worst of it all, however, is that the taint that has spread among the crew is bound to cause many more misfortunes in the days to come.

The warp breach has ended in untold losses. Thousands of voidborn are dead, and the ship's systems have sustained terrible damage. The worst of it all, however, is that the taint that has spread among the crew is bound to cause many more misfortunes in the days to come.

The warp breach has ended in untold losses. Thousands of voidsmen are dead, and the ship's systems have sustained terrible damage. Worst of all, however, is that the taint that has spread among the crew is bound to cause many more misfortunes in the days to come.

The warp breach has ended in untold losses. Thousands of voidsmen are dead, and the ship's systems have sustained terrible damage. Worst of all, however, is that the taint that has spread among the crew is bound to cause many more misfortunes in the days to come.

The warp breach has ended in untold losses. Thousands of voidsmen are dead, and the ship's systems have sustained terrible damage. Worst of all, however, is that the taint that has spread among the crew is bound to cause many more misfortunes in the days to come.

languages.text: 亚空间裂隙造成了巨大的损失，数千名船员死于非命，舰船各个系统遭受了严重破坏。但最糟糕的是，腐化已经蔓延到了船员之中，未来注定会造成更多破坏。
languages.original_text: The warp breach has ended in untold losses. Thousands of voidsmen are dead, and the ship's systems have sustained terrible damage. Worst of all, however, is that the taint that has spread among the crew is bound to cause many more misfortunes in the days to come.

traits.locale_text: 亚空间裂隙造成了巨大的损失，数千名船员死于非命，舰船各个系统遭受了严重破坏。但最糟糕的是，腐化已经蔓延到了船员之中，未来注定会造成更多破坏。

languages.text: La brecha de la disformidad ha provocado pérdidas incalculables. Miles de soldados del vacío han muerto y los sistemas de la nave han sufrido daños terribles. Lo peor de todo, sin embargo, es que la plaga que se ha extendido entre la tripulación causará muchas más desgracias en los próximos días.
languages.original_text: The warp breach has ended in untold losses. Thousands of voidsmen are dead, and the ship's systems have sustained terrible damage. Worst of all, however, is that the taint that has spread among the crew is bound to cause many more misfortunes in the days to come.

traits.locale_text: La brecha de la disformidad ha provocado pérdidas incalculables. Miles de soldados del vacío han muerto y los sistemas de la nave han sufrido daños terribles. Lo peor de todo, sin embargo, es que la plaga que se ha extendido entre la tripulación causará muchas más desgracias en los próximos días.

languages.text: <歪み>の裂け目は、計り知れないものを奪っていった。何千人ものヴォイズマンが命を落とし、船のシステムは大被害を被っている。さらに酷いのは、クルーの間で広がった汚染のせいで、今後さらに多くの苦境に立たされるのは間違いないという事だ。
languages.original_text: The warp breach has ended in untold losses. Thousands of voidsmen are dead, and the ship's systems have sustained terrible damage. Worst of all, however, is that the taint that has spread among the crew is bound to cause many more misfortunes in the days to come.

traits.locale_text: <歪み>の裂け目は、計り知れないものを奪っていった。何千人ものヴォイズマンが命を落とし、船のシステムは大被害を被っている。さらに酷いのは、クルーの間で広がった汚染のせいで、今後さらに多くの苦境に立たされるのは間違いないという事だ。

languages.text: La rupture du Warp provoque des pertes incommensurables. Des milliers de cosmomarins trouvent la mort, et les systèmes du vaisseau subissent d'importants dégâts. Plus grave encore, la corruption se répand au sein de l'équipage, et la situation risque de s'aggraver dans les jours à venir.
languages.original_text: The warp breach has ended in untold losses. Thousands of voidsmen are dead, and the ship's systems have sustained terrible damage. Worst of all, however, is that the taint that has spread among the crew is bound to cause many more misfortunes in the days to come.

traits.locale_text: La rupture du Warp provoque des pertes incommensurables. Des milliers de cosmomarins trouvent la mort, et les systèmes du vaisseau subissent d'importants dégâts. Plus grave encore, la corruption se répand au sein de l'équipage, et la situation risque de s'aggraver dans les jours à venir.

languages.text: Der Warpriss hatte gewaltige Verluste zur Folge. Tausende von Raumfahrern sind tot, und die Systeme des Schiffs haben schrecklichen Schaden erlitten. Am schlimmsten aber ist, dass der Makel, der sich in der Crew verbreitet hat, in den kommenden Tagen gewiss noch weiteres Unglück bringen wird.
languages.original_text: The warp breach has ended in untold losses. Thousands of voidsmen are dead, and the ship's systems have sustained terrible damage. Worst of all, however, is that the taint that has spread among the crew is bound to cause many more misfortunes in the days to come.

traits.locale_text: Der Warpriss hatte gewaltige Verluste zur Folge. Tausende von Raumfahrern sind tot, und die Systeme des Schiffs haben schrecklichen Schaden erlitten. Am schlimmsten aber ist, dass der Makel, der sich in der Crew verbreitet hat, in den kommenden Tagen gewiss noch weiteres Unglück bringen wird.

languages.text: Öteboyut tarığı, tarif edilemez kayıplara neden oldu. Binlerce uçsuz eri hayatını kaybetti, geminin sistemleri ağır hasar gördü. En kötüsü ise mürettebata bulaşan lekenin önümüzdeki günlerde çok daha fazla talihsizliğe yol açacak olması.
languages.original_text: The warp breach has ended in untold losses. Thousands of voidsmen are dead, and the ship's systems have sustained terrible damage. Worst of all, however, is that the taint that has spread among the crew is bound to cause many more misfortunes in the days to come.
